sentences: In 2013, Morris played a string of shows with TUFF featuring lead singer Stevie Rachelle and original bass player Todd Chaisson.
In 2014, Morris co-produced and played guitar on Lipstick, the debut album of glam metal band Lipstick Generation.
In 2016, Morris signed with High Vol Records.
On August 24 2018 he released an original CD in 2, Holdin' All The Aces, with the first single being Party Like The Weekend Never Ends.
He is currently playing with cover band Sunset Strip in Cleveland, Ohio.
He is currently playing with cover band Sunset Strip in Cleveland, Ohio. In 2018 Morris and Sunset Strip were voted the best local cover band by The Cleveland Hotlist.
